reviews.review: Ждёте Эпизод 3? А вы играли в первую часть?.....

Open a LAN game and select crossfire. That is the summary of the game. Those memories are all that's left, when the bastards have taken everything else.
Classic fun

It can be hard to get into an old game, especially right after playing a newer game of the same genre.  But Half-Life is DEFINITELY worth taking the time to play through.  Both it and the expansions are some of the absolute best games I've ever played in my life!  The story and the uniqueness make Half-Life a precious gem among games.
old but still very good

Who could not recommend Half-Life. It is the ultimate FPS!

Over 18 years old and still going strong!

Always will be #1 in my list!

Updated 11.22.17 - Still the best!

Updated 11.21.18 - 20 years later! Game of All Time!

One of the greatest games of all time. 'Nuff said. 

Play it again. Remind yourself. I did. The fuck you waitin' for? Install it. Now.
Best shooter ever^^
Awesome, classic game. Get it.
Великолепная игра! Никогда неустаревающая классика, положившая начало, всем современным шутерам.
It's amazing how a game looks almost like a action movie.
Greatest game of all time!!

Jogo mediano, mas altamente inovador para o que foi oferecido na época em que surgia FPS, principalmente por 2 fatores.
1° Por ter a mira livre
e 2° Por uma questao que nem nos BF3 atuais existe (SIMPLESMENTE TODAS AS ABALAS ATIRADAS FICAM CRAVADAS NA PAREDE), em nenhum jogo eu havia notado isso, e HALF LIFE 1 TEM ISSO.

Predecessor de um incrivel jogo HALF LIFE 2, (esse sim, me impressinou mesmo apos varios anos depois)
Bla Bla Bla Mr Freeman
É Half-Life! Precisa dizer mais? Se você ainda não jogou, está esperando o que?
A little old, but still an amazing game. Worth the $5
Half life 1, the first part of the half life storyline
An absolute classic, so much to do, and so much fun. Everyone should play this game at least once in their lives :'3
Merry Sissmas!
C'est juste énorme comme jeu... en 1920x1080... textures à revoir... mais il faut y jouer !
My favorite game of all time. I grew up with it and it's mods, and still play it today.

Uno dei gichi più importanti della storia. La grafica, creata nel 1997, era molto realistica per quei tempi, ed è un piacere oggi. Ogni angolo del gioco può essere fatale, per questo che bisogna rimanere sempre attenti a tutto ciò che ci circonda.

A valaha készült egyik legjobb FPS. A grafika ugyan mára már kissé megkopott, de a játékélmény továbbra is magával ragadja az embert. A játék, melyben Gordon Freeman, a szűkszavú fizikus a világ megmentőjévé válik, és megindul a Combine invázió a Föld ellen. Úttörő MI, hosszú játékidő, változatos pályák, remek történet, ez jellemzi a Half Life-ot.
Because ? BEST. GAME. EVER.
A legjobb sorozat. evör.
Best game ever...
绝对的好游戏，不过气氛实在太压抑……
Obviously this game is classic. It's fun and has great pacing. While you'll have firefights at times, puzzles mixed in keep things from getting too predictable and boring.  Must buy.
SAMAYA ROVNAYA IGRA EVER
Its a very solid fun fps.  Very over-rated, but important and still fun.
More people have heard of the game Angry Birds. You gotta be fucking shitting me. This game!

This should be a no-brainer.  Half-Life is perfect in every aspect.  Most importantly, Valve loves their loyal PC customers.  This is why such an old game runs perfectly in compatibility with any computer.  There are no known technical issues and it runs at a solid 60 frames per second with no stuttering.  Plainly stated, you're nuts if you haven't at least tried this game out yet.  At $10, you're basically stealing this game from Valve. 

Gameplay: 20/20 ... PERFECT
Story: 10/10 ... PERFECT

Sound/Music: 5/5 ... PERFECT
Controls: 5/5 ... PERFECT

Overall: 100% (40/40) ... PERFECT

É Half Life,não tem muito o que falar! foi o jogo que abriu uma das melhores series de jogos de fps.
Все всё знают. Вечная игра.
Graphics are trash.
I actually recommend all Half-life games. Step back and play the series which defined the FPS genre.
The shooter that changed shooters. Play a part of gaming history.

A decent first person shooter if you're into "retro" classics, but extremely long and simple. The AI is so primitive you will never face difficulty that requires you to strategize to accomplish anything, and the story is simply a tool to explain why you're shooting everything, rather than offering anything interesting. Characters are very bland, along with environments and missions, but the music quality is astounding.
Super jeu! Malgré qu'il date un peut,il est super plaisant a jouer,avec plein d'action!
고화질 팩이 억수로 부드랍네

[h1]9/10[/h1]
Геймплей и атмосфера невероятные, даже сейчас.
Но сюжета по нынешним меркам очень мало.

[b]Игра всех времен и народов![/b]

P.S. Да бросьте, зачем вы читаете обзоры. Ведь прошли же игру!

Simply one fo the best game I have played. Graphics may look ropey now, but the game-play keeps me coming back for more. Great story.

I have around thirty mods installed, ranging from dire graphics to great (poke464 and Vendetta) Hours and hours of replay value. 

This game was the reason I finally succumbed to using steam, when my original disk broke.

hard to complete... HL2 is far better. iff you want to know the full story just play opposing force (that took me only 3 days to complete this i can never get past chapter 7

The game that started it all. Half-Life tells a story of science and keeps players at the edge of their seats with action. If you want an FPS game with a story that rivals some RPGs, there should be no reason to wait any longer. Get Half-Life.
A old classic game that can be replayed time andtime agian. It is a fun adventure, for someone else to look at this and get mad at it.
Первая игра в которую по-настоящему научился играть! Имеется в виду мультиплеер и не много Adrenaline gamer мод.
Viciante! y excelente para despertar la nostalgia!
Der Klassiker aller Klassiker der Half-Life Serie immer wieder eine runde wert zu spielen!
one of the besst games ever made.  fight military zombies monsters etc
Stands with Doom 1 and 2 as one of the best FPSs ever made. Everything just feels right in this game, and it has a handful of great mods, like They Hunger.

This is a epic game. No dout about it. For a game from 1998, even for now. This game is amazeing. I have heard so many good things about this game, and expected epicness, but it still surpassed my expectations by a lot.
9.8/10
Игра - Легенда ! Прошел эту игру 4 раза и готов пройти еще 10.

The first Half - Life and jesus I have many memories with this game and it's expansions. Still an abolute masterpiece and fun to play to this day with the countless mods still available to download. If you want to play this with your friends download Sven Coop. It has the game along with it's expansion in coop form and extra mods to come with it. Overall great game and great game series.
What's the point of talking if people don't listen.

A fantastic game, even to this day.  The graphics are still impressive, as are the level designs.  The sounds effects have aged poorly, though the background music was not so bad.  The length and challenge level where both about right, though the final boss was tedius.  Perhaps the most impressive thing is that this game would not feel out of place today, yet was created so long ago.  Definitely a landmark title.

実はこのゲーム、持っててもやってない人が多い（TFCやCSとか目当てで買った為に）。
そんなビックリマンシールみたいな真似をしたのでは勿体無い、是非とも手を付けるべきだ。
その際には現代のOpenGLやDirectXでグリグリ動かすのもいいが、
ここはやはり低解像度のソフトウェアレンダリングでやってもらいたい。これはその時代のゲームだからだ。
nice spill

Half life started it all for what valve is today and what games exist. Without the success of HL1 modern games and source engine probably wouldn't even exist. But below that, this game uses the Quake engine. Which means that ID software helped become valve to become what it is today. With the fact that this game runs on the quake engine means there are many speed tricks : bunny hopping exists and the ever famous gauss jump. Those things aside, Half life is a game about an experiment which goes horribly wrong and opens up a portal of alien invasion. Still very famous for it's story and it's biggest modern day game which started as a mod: counter strike.

RECOMMENDED !!! 

=> OLD GAMES NEVER DIE <=
world's first indie game
It changed FPS and PC gaming in general. One of the best games I've ever played. There's also tons of modding.

You play as Gordon Freeman. I can't begin to explain how amazing this game is. It set forth a series of games as mods of this and changed the gaming world to what it is today. If you like action, if you like story, if you like scientists who don't speak and rock awesome goatees and beats things with a crowbar, this game is for you.
Probably one of my most favorite games of all time. Excellent story. Excellent gameplay. Excellent. Party on Wayne.
Required playing. Yes, it is a bit dated, but just play it and get sucked into the storyline. You should complete this before you play HL2, then things will make a lot more sense.

Still a classic FPS. Sure, it looked dated now, VERY dated to be honest, but it's still worth a spin if you have never played any of the others in the series, just don't go expecting Crysis looking prettiness.
Good fun

I Love the entire Half~Life series!.. Great 1st person Shooter Game Play with a strong Story line...  If you have not played any of the Half~Life games I recommend you start with the Original Half~Life and follow the Game series plot line from the start.
Still awesome :D
Awesome game, a lot different that its sequel though.
This is an AWESOME GAME AND IF THIS WASNT MADE THERE HAD BEEN NO HALF LIFE 2
All you do is shoot zombies, shoot retarded army people, and shoot moar zombies MOAR
The best game

*Sigh* oh how I love this game. Sure, I may not have clocked many hours on it according to my profile but I remember playing this at my local internet cafe many years ago and trying it out on other systems. Half-Life is a classic. It won't look like Crysis but back then... the stuff it introduced. Oh my, it was great and it still is. Brilliance. And Half-Life 2... sheesh, don't get me started.
im lovin` it
better than hl2
Amazing game, and forever will be.
Half-life vil altid være en favorit! Game hard my brothers!

This game started my love for game design. A major reason for this was because I grew up with it, and spent a big part of my childhood playing it, so everything I say about it will be laced with a bias.

If you're interested in the Half-Life story at all, this is a must buy. It will run beautifully on pretty much every computer these days. Many of the original mods for this game still have loyal followers to this day.
great game and always will be!

If you're going to play Half-Life 2 you don't need to bother because it's just Half-Life with updated graphics. That's seriously it, the voice acting, the music and the characters are all the same as Half-life. So this is better than Half-Life 2 in that the story is longer and more complex and it was made before Valve became the gigantic soul eating juggernaut that it is now. Also Gordon Freeman is a Hipster.

Auch wenn Half Life heute nicht mehr Zeitgemäß ist, das Spielen lohnt sich trotzdem allemal.  Vor allem schon deswegen um das legendäre Half Life 1 mal gespielt zu haben. Wenn man sich einmal dazu überwunden hat es anzufangen wird man nicht enttäuscht und gut Unterhalten.

Playing it through "properly" for the first time right now, and still one of the most amazing games ever!  Screw modern graphics, not many modern games have STORY and GAMEPLAY as good as this...

Verdict: 10/10.
this game is so sick. its like a cool halfway point between twitchy old school quake action and realistic new school modern warefare shooters

Claimed to be on the best franchises in videogame history I'm making way through the series. I enjoy the puzzle element attached with a first-person shooter and hopefully we'll get some more story as I progress through the series.

This is genesis, the game which started it all. I'm talking about the FPS craze obviously. This game put all the good, fun FPS games on the market, so if you want to see what started the revolution, pick this classic up. You won't regret it.
Playing this game feels like stepping into a nice warm bath, but instead of a few seconds of luxary, it lasts every second of playing this game.
Best game ever!!

One of the greatest games of all time, Half-Life was a milestone and a revolution of the first person shooter genre.
Just like Doom back in '93, Half-Life established in '98 the new standard for all shooters to come, and is still today acclaimed as the most influential video game of all time.

This is an old-school piece of history.
A must play for all gamers worth their crowbars.
A classic. The story is pretty cool and the game is fun to play except for those platforming parts here and there, especially at the end. It gets frustrating.
woohoo
Classic! If you havent played this, you either  dont like it which is ok,or your not a real pc gamer :3
